home.title: Lumistra
home.hero:
Creative design studio
transforming sparks and ideas
into brands and experiences.

about_us.paragraph:
We strongly believe that every idea is a spark
with potential. Through strategic collaboration
and bold branding initiatives, together we are
transforming it into your next big thing.

process.title:
When you're part of the process,
you're invested in the outcome.
process.paragraph: That's why we believe in building together.
process.cta: Scroll to see if we can help you

services.title: Services
services.paragraph_1:
If you're interested in collaborating but unsure if we offer a
specific service, feel free to ask here or visit

bio.title: About us
bio.paragraph:
Lumistra is an idea. A flare of guidance that leads and
motivates. We aim to offer the best possible solutions
to those who want to amplify their idea.

At Lumistra, we are committed to excel in just that -
transforming the initial spark into your next big thing.

services.title: Lumistra - Services
services.hero:
Overview of what we do
and how can we do it for you.

step_1.title: Timeless approach
step_1.paragraph:
We design for consistency, maintaining a timeless
approach that will stand the test of time. This means
having a flexible and scalable brand ready for future
innovation and adaptation in ever-changing environment.

step_2.title: Stay relevant
step_2.paragraph:
Our aim is to figure out the heart of your idea.
By recognizing the core values that drive your passion
we anticipate the future needs of the brand making it
relevant across all touchpoints.

step_3.title: Make a difference
step_3.paragraph:
Not every idea is big, but we believe each one can make
a difference. Our aim has always been to help you get it
out there with a little help from our side.

bio.title: What we do
bio.paragraph:
Our range of services cover almost everything you
might need for your next project. If you can’t find it
from the list, you can always scroll down  and type
in the service you need to see if we can help you.

check_in.title: Feel free to check-in
check_in.paragraph:
We never break contact and always
keep clients involved in the process to
ensure the best possible outcome.

idle.title: Ready when you are.
idle.paragraph:
You can type in the service you need
and get an answer right away.

positive.title: We can help you with that.
positive.paragraph:
The service you need is something
we can help you with. Feel free
to explore more or [get in touch](mailto:info@lumistra.com).

negative.title: We don’t do that, but...
negative.paragraph:
If you think that is something we can
help you with, you can always reach
out to us at [info@lumistra.com](mailto:info@lumistra.com)

workflow.title: Workflow blueprint
workflow.paragraph:
Peek at our creative process and see
what defines our approach to bringing
your vision to reality.

discovery.label: Discovery
discovery.paragraph:
Diving deep into understanding
the client’s needs and challenges,
while identifying potential goals
and long term solutions.

strategy_development.label: Strategy Development
strategy_development.paragraph:
Based on our findings, we
develop a tailored strategy that
outlines clear objectives and
action plans to guide our efforts.

magic_phase.label: Magic Phase
magic_phase.paragraph:
Collaborative brainstorming,
generating innovative ideas and
concepts that will resonate with
the target audience.

check_in.label: Check-In
check_in.paragraph:
We never break contact and
always keep clients involved in
the process to ensure the best
possible outcome.

review.label: Review
review.paragraph:
Assessing the effectiveness and
identifying areas for improvement
to maximize the impact and
success of the project.

ta_daa_moment.label: Ta-Daa Moment
ta_daa_moment.paragraph:
With attention to detail, we
execute the strategy, ensuring
consistency across all assets
and communications.

partnership_support.label: Partnership and Support
partnership_support.paragraph:
We maintain open communication
and collaboration with our clients
offering guidance and support in
overcoming challenges.

cta.title: Let’s work together.
cta.paragraph:
We are more than ready to hear
all about your next big thing.

cta.title: Want to publish an article?
cta.paragraph:
If you have something you would like to share
to our audience, you can always drop us a message
at [info@lumistra.com](mailto:info@lumistra.com)

article_3.title: Matt Willey Designs Custom Typeface for Vineyard Theatre Identity
